Tell Your Technical Story - Sherry Sontag - ACCU 2025 Short Talks
---

Learn how to tell your technical story with clarity and impact. In this inspiring and practical talk, veteran journalist and software engineering coach shares how developers and engineers can become powerful communicators—without needing to learn anything new. You already have everything you need to succeed in public speaking for engineers, technical presentations, and storytelling for developers.

Whether you're preparing for a software engineering talk, a conference presentation, or simply trying to explain your work to peers, this session will help you move past impostor syndrome and perfectionism. You'll discover how to stop overediting, embrace your natural voice, and craft compelling narratives using the challenges, puzzles, and real-world experiences from your engineering journey.

Topics include technical storytelling, developer communication, C++ reflectio
title: Tell Your Technical Story - Sherry Sontag - ACCU 2025 Short Talks
